ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] LIZARDS ARE CUTE
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw one last night and I agree, absolutely nifty-looking race (who says nifty anymore? Just me, I guess)... and I didn t think about starting a shaman, and
ygData.messageBody:
I saw one last night and I agree, absolutely nifty-looking race (who says nifty anymore? Just me, I guess)... and I didn't think about starting a shaman, and now I'm convinced I'll have to... get my partner to be the monk... heck, we might forget about our primaries for a while... Someone told me that you really need a fast graphics card for Kunark?

Christina Norman wrote:

> Ok, this might just be a rant, but since it's non hostile I'm going to post it here =)
>
> WOW Iksar are so cute. The first time I ever saw one I was like...oh my gosh! It walks around and swings its little tail and talks and everything! It's like the best pet!
>
